item.title: HUMAN EXPERIENCE FOR TRANSHUMAN
item.description: Concept XHuman: Educational Headset for transhumans to Experience “Human” in 2075 Project Information Phase / Period Concept, Design, Build Period* 10⁄2018 (2 weeks) Team / Role Researcher(Me), Professor Method Future Cone, Future’s Wheel, Timeline, Persona, Empathy Map, Storyboard, technological research Output* Physical prototype, User’s Manual Objective How can Humans and Transhumans coexist towards a sustainable society in 2075?
